thread.title: ABC's FBI drama Quantico is getting a full season - US TV
thread.title_full: ABC's FBI drama Quantico is getting a full season - US TV News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: ABC's FBI drama Quantico is getting a full season - US TV
text: ABC is handing a full season order to freshman drama Quantico.The network announced today that it would be ordering six more episodes of the FBI thriller series, bringing it to what ABC considers a full season because of its mid-season drama commitments. Â© ABC Quantico is told from the perspective of Alex Parrish (Priyanka Chopra), an FBI recruit suspected of planning a massive terror attack.The series examines the truth of Alex and her fellow FBI recruits' training through flashbacks, and how it contributed to the deadly attack.Joshua Safran developed Quantico for ABC, after working previously on Gossip Girl and Smash.Quantico airs on Sundays at 10pm ET on ABC. Alibi screens the series in the UK.
